/ping.description: Checks if the bot is online.

/kick.description: Kicks a user from the server.

/ban.description: Bans a user from the server.

/unban.description: Unbans a user from the server.

/timeout.description: Timeouts a user from the server.

/check.description: Checks if a user has Nexus Premium.

/disconnect.description: Disconnects the bot from the Voice Channel. (Premium only)

/ai.description: Generates a response using AI. (Premium only)

/credits.description: Shows the credits of the bot.

/invite.description: Sends the invite link of the bot.

/legal.description: Shows the legal information of the bot.
